participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Friendly and passionate about his hobbies.
participant_1.background: I love cooking but I also enjoy fishing. I also love comic books. Hey, my name is Larry and I am a chef. If I'm not cooking in the kitchen then I'm definitely on the water.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and patient, waiting for new opportunities.
participant_2.background: I have a German shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. I enjoy coloring books and like to watch NHL hockey.
